item.title: Paste text on VNC terminal
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: A coworker recently faced the problem to copy&pasting a large amount of text into a VNC terminal for openQA. VNC doesn’t always allow copy&paste and when you have to manually type a longer string this is prone to typos and human error.
